/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses, painted in a palette of mostly blue, white, and gray, fill the street, hinting at the city's dynamic pace of life. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and vehicles.
